name: zxpinstaller
description: An simple cross platform ZXP installer.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:osx && npm run build:win
scripts.build:osx: npm run clean:osx && electron-packager ./app "OpenAsset InDesign Plugin Installer" --out=release/osx --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.25.3 --icon=assets/osx/icon.icns
scripts.build:win: npm run clean:win && electron-packager ./app "OpenAsset InDesign Plugin Installer" --out=release/win --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=0.25.3 --icon=assets/win/icon.ico
scripts.pack: npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win

author: CreativeDo
